text: vWorker was a website that helped companies find people to do jobs for them. It was like other big websites that help freelancers find work, such as Elance, Freelancer.com, Guru.com, and Upwork. vWorker helped make it easier to manage people who work from different places. In 2012, Freelancer.com bought vWorker. After that, if you went to the vWorker website, it would send you to Freelancer.com. == References == Category:American websites
title: VWorker
